ability.name: Baton Pass
ability.description: Pass turn to another after 1 More, increasing their attack and recovery.

ranks.text: Requires rank 2 kindness. The date must also be after 5/6. Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks the Girl Talk ability, giving Ann the chance to step in and rescue a failed shadow negotiation.

ability.name: Girl Talk
ability.description: Chance to step in and save a failed shadow negotiation

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Ann the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up. Unlocks the Inokashira Park location.

ability.name: Follow Up
ability.description: Chance to follow up after Joker's attack.

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Crocodile Tears ability, which gives Ann the chance to lower a shadow's demands during shadow negotiation.

ability.name: Crocodile Tears
ability.description: Chance to lower demands during shadow negotiation.

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Ann the chance to remove status ailments from party members when in the party.

options.dialogue: "Listen to what she has to say."

ability.name: Harisen Recovery
ability.description: Chance to remove status ailments from party members when in the party.

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Sexy Technique ability, which gives Ann the chance to seduce shadows during shadow negotiation.

ability.name: Sexy Technique
ability.description: Chance to further lower demands during shadow negotiation

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Ann a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.

ability.name: Endure
ability.description: Chance to survive an attack that would otherwise kill.

ranks.text: Romance becomes available at this rank.Romance - "You have me."Friendship - "You have the others."Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Ann the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.

ability.name: Protect
ability.description: Will take a blow that would otherwise kill Joker.

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Ann's Persona to its final form, Hecate.

name: Ann
location: Underground Mall in Shibuya after school.
gift: Powdered Green Tea Set, KGB49 Music CD.
